resources.string: Open QR scan feature in our app on member device and scan this QR code or enter this GroupID on your member device to add member to this Group.
Enter the GroupID or use scan QR code feature and move on parent device to scan QR code to add this device to your Group.
PLEASE READ THESE TERMS OF USER CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THE KEEPFOCUS APPLYCATION

a.With the parent mode : it will help you manager and control the launcher of any active application which was installed on your children device. You can control the time, the active application or block on your children device via KeepFocus in parent mode.

b.With the children mode : you can only visible the application which are blocking and the time these be blocked. And without the block time, you can see and check the notifications are missed on this block time.
3.The application will need use (this content will show for user permissions require which are need for using application)
I have read and agree to all terms and conditions above
Click on button "JOIN TO GROUP" if you want to join this device to already exist group
"Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
